DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare quality life patient unresectable hilar cholangiocarcinoma palliative metallic stent versus plastic Stent .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Patients With Unresectable Hilar Cholangiocarcinoma Palliative Metallic Stent Versus Plastic Stent
DOC.detailed_description: In patient unresectable hilar cholangiocarcinoma , palliative biliary stent one way help . The aim palliative treatment improve quality life relief symptom , sometime , extend survival rate . There two type biliary stent : 1. plastic stent make polyethylene polytetrafluoroethylene 2. metalic stent braid form tubular mesh surgical-grade stainless steel alloy design expand maximum diameter 10mm . The main drawback plastic stent relatively high occlusion rate , advantage low cost . In reason high occlusion rate , low cost plastic stent versus metallic stent stent exchange occlude , would know quality life group .
DOC.criteria: All patient diagnosis hilar cholangiocarcinoma and/or radiological diagnosis Patient consider unresectable tumor unfit operation advance age medical illness Patient ASA 4 5 Patient inability comply follow Patient refuse join research
